DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy quetiapine fumarate combine Cognitive Remediation Therapy ( CRT ) conventional treatment evaluate change social outcome patient schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Seroquel® Combined With Cognitive Remediation Therapy Conventional Treatment Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Documented clinical diagnosis schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder least 2 year . Clinically stable outpatient set enter study ( visit 1 ) . Use clozapine quetiapine within two month prior visit 1 . If total point ≤ 55 Intelligence quotient ( IQ ) accord score WAISIII test visit 1 .
